author: adam-koblentz
body:
I saw a bug from a few months ago about Ubuntu 17 support not being ready yet.

Has that moved at all? I still don't see the package in the repos.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @adam-koblentz Thanks! We already have a issue to track this #3961 and it is high priority.

title: Support for Ubuntu 17.04?
